PH::make_coin(C,PH).
coin(C) :- make_coin(C,0.8).
coins_r(SC,SC,0).
coins_r(SC,S,CNT) :-
 CNT > 0,
 
(coin(CNT) -> 
        NewSC is SC + 1, 
        NewCNT is CNT - 1, 
        coins_r(NewSC, S, NewCNT)
    ; 
        NewCNT is CNT - 1, 
        coins_r(SC, S, NewCNT)
.
total(S) :- coins_r(0,S,4).
query(total(_)).
